item.title: Native Apple Silicon JDKs
item.description: Photo by Joey Banks in Unsplash I bought an M1 Mac Mini, and I have been using it as my main personal desktop â€” games aside â€” for the last months. I’m extreamly pleased with this machine: it’s small, it feels fast and snappy, it’s quiet â€” I have never ever heard the fans â€” and its power consumption is very low. Apple’s plan is to carry out a 2-year transition from November 2020 to replace its Intel-based Macs by M-something ones.

item.title: About Me
